page.title: 15A COSHESTON CHILD'S DAY
page.content: I am a ten year old boy. I get up at 7.3O each morning, clean my teeth, dress and have cereal for breakfast. Next I feed the dog, cat and the rabbit, then my mum takes me to Cosheston village school in the car. I enjoy maths and English and I have school dinners every day. There are three classes in our school and the children are aged from four to eleven. At 3.4O I come home from school and watch T.V. After that I have to do my homework. Then we have tea.Sometimes I go out to play with my friends on our bikes. On Mondays I go to cubs in the village hall and on Thursdays I go to judo at the Youth Centre in Pembroke Dock. At 8.3O I have to go in, then I have my supper which is toast. After that I have to go to bed.
